meanings.sent1: The new jacket is the trendiest item in the store.
meanings.sent2: She always wears the trendiest clothes to school.
meanings.sent3: Even the pets in the neighborhood are trying to look trendiest with their new collars.
meanings.sent4: Her phone case is the trendiest accessory, like a shiny jewel.
meanings.sent5: The trendiest hairstyle this season is the bob with bangs.

meanings.definition: Characterized by the latest trends or fashions.
meanings.sent1: The boutique sells the trendiest clothes in town.
meanings.sent2: Their apartment is decorated in the trendiest style.
meanings.sent3: The trendiest car on the street had neon lights underneath.
meanings.sent4: His music taste is the trendiest, always ahead of the curve.
meanings.sent5: The trendiest restaurant in the city serves fusion cuisine.
